api_key.description: API Key for a specific (virtual) server.
api_key.name: X-apikey

role_id.description: ID of the role you want to impersonate (requires that the role associated with the API key passed in the header above has global 'root' or global 'setrid' permissions).
role_id.name: X-su

tags.description: Basic calls that provide you with all the necessary HTML to include into your webpage for logging in (sessions), enrolling new users (registration) and logging out (sessions).
tags.name: HTML

tags.description: Everything about session management and login.
tags.name: Sessions

tags.description: Enrolling new users or coupling an exising account to a user.
tags.name: Registration

tags.description: Everything for managing the access and authorisations to the servers themselves: permissions, roles and apikeys.
tags.name: Management

tags.description: Everything about global and privileged server attributes. Required permission: global 'servers'.
tags.name: Global

get.description: Get all API keys generated by the current role. Required permission: global 'servers'.

200.description: List of apikeys (with role and description)

get.summary: Get all API keys.

post.description: Create a new API key. Required permission: global 'servers'.

200.description: Newly created apikey (with role and description)

delete.description: Delete all global attributes. Required permission: global 'servers'.

get.description: Returns an array containing all global attributes. Required permission: global 'servers'.
get.summary: Get all global attributes

post.description: Set the global attributes. Prior attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will be deleted. Required permission: global 'servers'.

put.description: Update the specified global attributes. Prior attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will not be deleted. Required permission: 'servers'.

delete.description: Delete global attribute with the specified key. Required: global 'servers'.

get.description: List all the servers you have the permissions for. Required permission: 'servers'.
get.summary: List all your servers

post.description: Create a new server. Required permission: global 'createserver'.

parameters.description: Server data (note that serverid, serverpk and validtime are generated by the server)
parameters.name: createServerBody

200.description: Server config for newly created server

get.description: Returns the configuration of a specific server. Required permission: 'servers' or 'createserver'.
get.summary: Configuration of a specific server

put.description: Update the configuration of a specific server. Required permission: 'createserver'.

parameters.description: Server data (note that serverid and serverpk cannot be changed)
parameters.name: server

put.summary: Update configuration of a specific server

get.description: Returns all account. Required permission 'accounts'.

parameters.description: Filter users based on an attribute. Takes the format *attributename=attributevalue*. You can filter for multiple values at once, e.g. *group=in:group1,group2*
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Sort the results by column. You can also specify ascending (default if not specified) or descending, e.g., *column:asc* . You can also sort by multiple columns, e.g., *column1:desc,column2:asc*
parameters.name: sort

get.summary: Get all accounts

get.description: Returns the account. Required permission: 'sessions' or 'accounts'.
get.summary: Get specific account

put.description: Update an account. The only available change is (un)blocking the account. Required permission: 'accounts'.

parameters.description: True if the account is blocked
parameters.name: blocked

post.description: Push a login to the nextAuth app for the user to confirm, based on the given account (app instance). Required permission: 'sessions' or 'accounts'.

parameters.description: Base64 encoded nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

parameters.description: Session information to display to user
parameters.name: userContext

post.summary: Push a login confirmation to the user's app

put.description: Update the user of the given account. Required permission: 'accounts'.
put.summary: Update user of the given account.

delete.description: Delete all attributes of a specific server. Required permission: 'servers'.
delete.summary: Delete all attributes of a specific server

get.description: Returns an array containing all attributes corresponding to this server. Required permission: 'servers'.
get.summary: Get all attributes of a specific server

post.description: Set the attributes of a specific server. Prior attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will be deleted. Required permission: 'servers'.
post.summary: Set all attributes of a specific server

put.description: Update the specified attributes of a specific server. Prior attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will not be deleted. Required permission: 'servers'.
put.summary: Update specified attributes of a specific server

delete.description: Delete attribute with the specified key of a specific server. Required permission: 'servers'.
delete.summary: Delete specific attribute of a specific server

get.description: Returns all permissions. Required permission: 'servers'.
get.summary: Get all permissions for the specified server.

delete.description: Revoke all permissions for the specified server and role. Required permission: 'root'.
delete.summary: Revoke all permissions for the specified server and role.

get.description: Returns all permissions. Required permission: 'servers'.
get.summary: Get all permissions for the specified server and role.

post.description: Set new permissions for the specified role on a server. This overwrites any existing permissions on this server for the specified role. Required permission: 'root'.
post.summary: Set new permissions for the specified role on a server

delete.description: Delete all privileged attributes of a specific server. Required permission: global 'servers'.
delete.summary: Delete all privileged attributes of a specific server

get.description: Returns an array containing all privileged attributes corresponding to this server. Required permission: global 'servers'.
get.summary: Get all privileged attributes of a specific server

post.description: Set the privileged attributes of a specific server. Prior attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will be deleted. Required permission: global 'servers'.
post.summary: Set all privileged attributes of a specific server

put.description: Update the specified privileged attributes of a specific server. Prior privileged attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will not be deleted. Required permission: global 'servers'.
put.summary: Update privileged specified attributes of a specific server

delete.description: Delete privileged attribute with the specified key of a specific server. Required permission: global 'servers'.
delete.summary: Delete specific privileged attribute of a specific server

get.description: Based on the browser/webserver session identifier, check if the user is logged in and return the associated username. This also returns additional information: the data for the login qr code and whether or not a loggin can be provoked directly from the server. Required permission: 'sessions'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

get.summary: Check if the user is logged in

get.description: Generate HTML to enrol a new user. Required permission: 'sessions'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

parameters.description: Name to forward to the nextAuth app for this account
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: User name to register this user under
parameters.name: userid

get.summary: Generate HTML to enrol a new user

get.description: HTML to add to footer of HTML page. Required permission: 'sessions'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

parameters.description: Additional sessions that should be monitored through the websocket.
parameters.name: HtmlFooterBody

get.summary: Generic HTML to add to footer. Required for login/logout/enrol functionality.

get.description: Generate HTML for the login block. Required permission: 'sessions'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

parameters.description: Session information to display to user.
parameters.name: userContext

get.summary: Generate HTML for the login block

post.description: Force a logout on the given session. Required permission: 'sessions'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

post.summary: Force a logout on the given session

post.description: Push a login to the nextAuth app for the user to confirm, based on last account that successfully logged in for the given session. Required permission: 'sessions'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

parameters.description: Session information to display to user.
parameters.name: userContext

post.summary: Push a login confirmation to the user's app

get.description: Returns the data for an enrol qr code. Required permission: 'sessions'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

parameters.description: Name to forward to the nextAuth app for this account
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: User name to register this user under
parameters.name: userid

parameters.description: 'png' for a PNG image, not set for raw data in the qr code
parameters.name: img

parameters.description: size in pixels of the qr code, defaults to 500
parameters.name: s

200.description: Raw byte array containing the enrol qr code data (either raw or as a PNG image).

get.summary: Generate data for an enrol qr code

get.description: Returns the data for a login qr code. Required permission: 'sessions'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

parameters.description: "png" for a PNG image, not set for raw data in the qr code
parameters.name: img

parameters.description: size in pixels of the qr code, defaults to 500
parameters.name: s

parameters.description: Session information to display to user.
parameters.name: userContext

200.description: Raw byte array containing the login qr code data (either raw or as a PNG image).

get.summary: Generate data for a login qr code

post.description: Register a user for the currently logged in account. You can also directly pass a user name when generating an ENROL qr code. Required permission: 'users'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

post.summary: Register a userid for the currently logged in account.

post.description: Create a transaction for approval within the current session. Required permission: 'sessions'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

403.description: no account associated with this session

post.summary: Create a transaction to be approved within the current session.

get.description: Get transaction result for a given transaction id. Required permission: 'sessions'.

404.description: no transaction with given id found

get.summary: Get transaction result for a given transaction.

get.description: Returns an array of arrays containing all accounts corresponding to all users. Required permission: 'users'.

parameters.description: Filter users based on an attribute. Takes the format *attributename=attributevalue*. You can filter for multiple values at once, e.g. *group=in:group1,group2*
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Sort the results by column. You can also specify ascending (default if not specified) or descending, e.g., *column:asc* . You can also sort by multiple columns, e.g., *column1:desc,column2:asc*
parameters.name: sort

get.summary: Get all users

delete.description: Delete all accounts corresponding to this user. The user itself is not deleted. Required permission: 'accounts' or 'users'.
delete.summary: Delete all accounts of a specific user

get.description: Returns an array containing all accounts corresponding to this user. Required permission: 'sessions' or 'users'.

parameters.description: Sort the results by column. You can also specify ascending (default if not specified) or descending, e.g., *column:asc* . You can also sort by multiple columns, e.g., *column1:desc,column2:asc*
parameters.name: sort

get.summary: Get all accounts of a specific user

delete.description: Delete all attributes of a specific user. Required permission: 'users'.
delete.summary: Delete all attributes of a specific user

get.description: Returns an array containing all attributes corresponding to this user. Required permission: 'sessions' or 'users'.
get.summary: Get all attributes of a specific user

post.description: Set the attributes of a specific user. Prior attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will be deleted. Creates the user if not exists. Required permission: 'users'.
post.summary: Set all attributes of a specific user

put.description: Update the specified attributes of a specific user. Prior attributes with keys that are not provided in the body of the request will not be deleted. Required permission: 'users'.
put.summary: Update specified attributes of a specific user

delete.description: Delete attribute with the specified key of a specific user. Required permission: 'users'.
delete.summary: Delete specific attribute of a specific user

post.description: Push a login to the nextAuth app for the user to confirm, based on the given userid. Required permission: 'sessions' or 'users'.

parameters.description: Nonce to identify the browser/webserver session
parameters.name: X-nonce

parameters.description: Session information to display to user.
parameters.name: userContext

post.summary: Push a login confirmation to the user's app

get.description: Get role for a specific user. Required permission: 'users'.

404.description: User not found, no role found for user

get.summary: Get role for a specific user.

post.description: Get or create a role for a specific user. Required permission: 'users'.
post.summary: Get or create a role for a specific user.

get.description: Returns a PNG of the visual hash corresponding to this server. This visual hash is used during the registration process (optional), for the user to verify that (s)he is registering with the right server in the nextAuth app. For single-server nextAuth-enabled apps (white label or mobile SDK), the public key of the server is typically pinned within the app and hence this visual hash is not displayed to the user. Required permission: 'sessions' or 'servers'.

200.description: Raw byte array containing the visual hash of this server as a PNG image.

get.summary: Visual hash of this server

blocked.description: True if the account is blocked, false otherwise

clientVersion.description: Version nextAuth client in the app

description.description: Description of the account (e.g. device name)

canprovoke.description: True if a login can be pushed from the server, false otherwise

hsid.description: Converted session id, used by the websockets

loggedin.description: True if the user is loggedin, false otherwise

loginqrdata.description: Base64 encoded data that is represented in the login qr code

pk.description: Base64 encoded public key of the nextAuth app. This uniquely identifies the account on the nextAuth app, regardless of the username

accountCount.description: Number of accounts registered with this server

appandroid.description: URL of the app in Google Play

appios.description: URL of the app in the App Store

pinTimeout.description: Time (minutes) since the last time the user entered his PIN, that the user is not requested a PIN at login. -1 means that the user is never asked for a PIN before logging in, 0 means that the user is asked every time he wants to login

pinTransTimeout.description: Time (minutes) since the last time the user entered his PIN, that the user is not requested a PIN at transaction approval. -1 means that the user is never asked for a PIN before approving a transaction, 0 means that the user is asked every time he wants to approve a transaction

pingTime.description: Time (seconds) that the nextAuth app has before it needs to reply to a ping request from the nextAuth server (continuous authentication)

serverid.description: Base64 encoded id of the nextAuth server

serverpk.description: Base64 encoded public key of the nextAuth server
